feed.title: Fireshare Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Fireshare: v1.2.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Configurable Thumbnail Location by @ShaneIsrael in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/237

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/compare/v1.2.16...v1.2.17

entry.title: New release for Fireshare: v1.2.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix Open Graph tags by @ShaneIsrael in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/241

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/compare/v1.2.17...v1.2.18

entry.title: New release for Fireshare: v1.2.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add DOMAIN env variable to be injected into the metadata which should allow sites like facebook to correctly display the video by @ShaneIsrael in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/243

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/compare/v1.2.18...v1.2.19

entry.title: New release for Fireshare: v1.2.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add support for 127.0.0.1 alongside localhost when getting relative URLs by @JackBailey in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/248
  • Update greenlet version for Python 3.11+ support by @JackBailey in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/247
  • Update docker-compose.yml by @ShaneIsrael in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/251
  • Disable nginx sendfile by @ShaneIsrael in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/255

New Contributors

  • @JackBailey made their first contribution in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/248

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/compare/v1.2.19...v1.2.20

entry.title: New release for Fireshare: v1.2.21
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix LDAP auth crash, switch to SCOPE_SUBTREE, and improve logging by @msmcpeake in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/275

New Contributors

  • @msmcpeake made their first contribution in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/275

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/compare/v1.2.20...v1.2.21
